hotels.vendor_name: Chateau Saint-Martin & Spa - an Oetker Collection Hotel
hotels.title: Southern France Hillside Chateau Suites & Villas with Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Award-Winning Spa
hotels.description: Step into Provençal paradise at Chateau Saint Martin & Spa, and unwind with award-winning treatments at Spa Saint-Martin by La Prairie in garden cabanas adorned with flowers. Head to Le Saint-Martin for an evening of Michelin-starred dining on a panoramic terrace, or discover L'Oliveraie for fresh Mediterranean flavours in a shady olive grove setting. Perched atop a hill, the property overlooks the sparkling French Riviera for sweeping views of the Mediterranean. Just a short drive away guests can explore the medieval city of Saint-Paul-de-Vence, the iconic seaside town of Nice, the perfume capital of Grasse and the stunning Verdon Gorge - one of France's most breathtaking natural wonders.

hotels.title: Sophisticated French-Chic Stay near Nice International Airport
hotels.description: The glittering cobalt seas and pebbled beaches of Nice are a stone's throw away when you stay at Crowne Plaza Nice - Grand Arenas, an IHG Hotel, a modern escape conveniently located by the city's international airport. When you're not dining on Niçois gourmet delights or losing yourself in the art museums, indulge in a bistro meal or evening cocktail at BALM restaurant and bar. Or, head to the top floor, where the well-equipped fitness centre and sauna will keep you both active and relaxed.
